data.title: California Department of Tax and Fee Administration Reports Cannabis Tax Revenue Increases in Third Quarter of 2018
data.excerpt: Sacramento – The California Department of Tax and Fee Administration (CDTFA) reported increased revenue numbers today for cannabis sales for the 3rd quarter of 2018.
data.author: Department of Cannabis Control
tags: California department of tax and fee administration
